actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

actions.subcommittee: Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice

official_title: A bill to provide that salaries for Federal judges be increased by 3.5 percent, representing the pay comparability adjustment received by Federal officers and employees generally as of the beginning of the current calendar year.

summary.text: Increases by 3.5 percent the salary rate of all Federal judges, including Supreme Court justices.

titles.title: A bill to provide that salaries for Federal judges be increased by 3.5 percent, representing the pay comparability adjustment received by Federal officers and employees generally as of the beginning of the current calendar year.
